title: Drawing, "Design for Two Banners, for Checkmate", 1937
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white paper
signed: Signed in black ink, lower right: E. Mcknight Kauffer
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower right: Checkmate 2 Banners
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Design for two banners. On the left, black pole, black square inside white triangle, bordered by a blue and a black triangle and ending with two gray triangles; on the right, red pole, dark red circle inside light red triangle, bordered by a yellow and a white triangle and ending with two dark red triangles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Two Banners, for Checkmate", 1937.
1937. Brush and gouache, graphite on white paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-287.
